name: Little Imps: A Dungeon Builder
description: Establish yourself as a feared ruler of the underworld! Create your own dungeon, conquer cities, subjugate menacing creatures and make them to your bidding. Start excavating your lair now in "Little Imps: A Dungeon Builder"!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
